thread.section_title: PastBook Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van PastBook | pastbook.com
thread.title: Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text: I was disappointed to not receive the book in the time frame as it was a gift. I wrote and the customer service from several people was great with the communication. I had been told that they were having time issues with so many people ordering but guess I missed the notification . Laura I believe was the last lady that solved the problem but everyone that responded to me were such great people. The book is beautiful and so happy when it arrived safe and sound and such great quality. I have several friends ordering now that they have seen how beautiful it is. Birthday gift for my 96 year old Mother. She will be going to spend many hours looking at it. Thank you. SUCH GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE. LOVE ALL OF THE TEAM.
